attributes.additional_details: Online anonymity is an incredibly important aspect of the internet and online privacy. This kind of law, requiring any social media account to be verified by ID, could allow scammers and hackers to find personal details and commit identity fraud more easily.
attributes.background: We want to keep the internet anonymous. #SaveAnonymity

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579714
